title: mri_morphology
description: MRI Morphology Tool - performs various morphological operations on a volume.

input_volume.title: Input Volume
input_volume.description: Input volume file on which operations are to be applied.

operation.title: Operation
operation.description: Morphological operation to be performed. Options include: open, close, dilate, erode, mode, fill_holes, erode_bottom, dilate_thresh, erode_thresh.

number_iter.title: Number of Iterations
number_iter.description: Number of iterations to apply the operation.

output_volume.title: Output Volume
output_volume.description: Output volume file to store the results of the operation.

label_option.title: Label Option
label_option.description: Only apply operations to the specified label instead of all nonzero voxels.
